 Square

Detailed Description

Handles all the drawing functionality.

Parameters:
LineColor The color of the line to be drawn.
LineThickness How wide the line to be drawn will be.
LineShape The shape of the line (i.e. rounded, square, etc.)
Enabled Holds whether or not the drawing functionality is enabled.
_lineShapeTypes The private backing field for LineShapeTypes (can be set).
LineShapeTypes The public-facing list of possible line shapes (read-only).
